channel.title: RS2hd - Shard Revolutions [Beta]
channel.description:
[b]Introduction[/b] [b]Hi there you know me from releasing Shard Revolutions 525.Well first may i say ive created a new Shard Revolutions Project by using Paladino's 525 base because it has no nulls,Great Stability,and its fun to code and by this speech id like to say a big thanks to him.[/b]
Well lets get started here is what ive done so far its not much but its a start.
[20/5/09] Player login Walking Member item's added
[21/5/09] Banking Post Message System Starter Command Players Command Three Npc's Added
Well ill post a few pics later and ill add more as i go along. Like i said its not much but its a start and im looking for a development Team.

item.title: RS2hd - Shard Revolutions [Beta]
item.dc:creator: @shardyboy shardyboy
item.description:
@shardyboy wrote:

Introduction
Hi there you know me from releasing Shard Revolutions 525.Well first may i say ive created a new Shard Revolutions Project by using Paladino’s 525 base because it has no nulls,Great Stability,and its fun to code and by this speech id like to say a big thanks to him.

Well lets get started here is what ive done so far its not much but its a start.

[20/5/09]
Player login
Walking
Member item’s added

[21/5/09]
Banking
Post Message System
Starter Command
Players Command
Three Npc’s Added

Well ill post a few pics later and ill add more as i go along.
Like i said its not much but its a start and im looking for a development Team.
